message.content:
cs.IT, cs.CC, cs.DS, cs.CG, cs.CR

Reasoning: The paper deals with the problem of decoding lattices, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT) and computational complexity (cs.CC). The use of locally dense lattices and sparsification techniques suggests a connection to data structures (cs.DS) and computational geometry (cs.CG). The paper also discusses the hardness of the problem, which falls under the category of cryptography and security (cs.CR).
